name: Calling
description: Summons or calls forth creatures or entities appropriate to the invocation; specifics depend on caster and ritual.

name: Escape
description: Enables rapid disengagement or teleport-like escape from immediate danger or bonds.

name: Heal Wounds
description: Heals injuries, restoring hit points or S.D.C.; more effective on less severe wounds.

name: Horror
description: Creates an overwhelming aura or illusion that can momentarily stun or terrify affected creatures.

name: Id Barrier
description: A very powerful protective barrier of identity/psychic shielding (high-level invocation).

name: Influence the Beast
description: Affects animals' behavior causing them to be calm, hostile, or to follow simple commands.

name: Magic Shield
description: Conjures a protective magical shield that reduces or blocks incoming damage.

name: Repel Animals
description: Causes animals in the area to avoid or flee the caster; effective for crowding or predators.
effects: Does not affect humanoids unless specified

name: Shockwave
description: Unleashes a concussive blast that damages and may knock down or stun targets in an area.

name: Superhuman Strength
description: Temporarily increases the subject's physical strength well beyond normal limits.

name: Sustain
description: Maintains life functions or ongoing beneficial effects, halting deterioration.

name: Wisps of Confusion
description: Creates illusory wisps that confuse and disorient targets, causing misperception and errors.
